from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.types import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import *
from pyspark.sql.functions import udf
from pyspark.sql.utils import AnalysisException
from pyspark.sql import Row
from datetime import datetime, timezone
import ast
import re

account_name = "chiransubdl"
container_name = "chiransubfs"

customer_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/customers.csv")
geolocation_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/geolocation.csv")
delivery_services_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/delivery_services.csv")
order_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/orders.csv")
order_items_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/order_items.csv")
order_reviews_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/order_reviews.csv")
order_payments_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/order_payments.csv")
products_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/products.csv")
product_categories_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/product_categories.csv")
sellers_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/sellers.csv")
suppliers_raw_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name,account_name,"data/stage/suppliers.csv")

customer_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(customer_raw_path)
customer_df.createOrReplaceTempView("customer")

order_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(order_raw_path)
order_df.createOrReplaceTempView("order")

order_items_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(order_items_raw_path)
order_items_df.createOrReplaceTempView("orderitems")

order_payments_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(order_payments_raw_path)
order_payments_df.createOrReplaceTempView("orderpayments")

order_reviews_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(order_reviews_raw_path)
order_reviews_df.createOrReplaceTempView("orderreviews")

products_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(products_raw_path)
products_df.createOrReplaceTempView("product")

product_categorie_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(product_categories_raw_path)
product_categorie_df.createOrReplaceTempView("productcategories")

geolocation_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(geolocation_raw_path)
geolocation_df.createOrReplaceTempView("geolocation")

delivery_services_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(delivery_services_raw_path)
delivery_services_df.createOrReplaceTempView("deliveryservices")

seller_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(sellers_raw_path)
seller_df.createOrReplaceTempView("seller")

supplier_df = spark.read\
                .option("header", True)\
                .option("inferSchema", True)\
                .csv(suppliers_raw_path)
supplier_df.createOrReplaceTempView("supplier")

getBirthYear = udf(lambda z: getsubstring(z,0,4))
getBirthMonth = udf(lambda z: getsubstring(z,5,7))
getAge = udf(lambda z: calc_age(z))
ageCategoryBucketizer = udf(lambda z: bucketize(z,[0,18,23,39,55,64,199],["Children","GenerationZ","Millenials","GenX","BabyBoomer","Silent"]),StringType())
socialStateBucketizer = udf(lambda z: social_state(z,["0-19999","100000-199999"],["Poor","Wealthy","Mid Level Income"]),StringType())
